title: Re: PayPal Withholding My Funds Beyond the 180-Day Period
text:
PayPal Withholding My Funds Beyond the 180-Day Period
MutazNasar
New Community Member
[Options](#)

Subscribe to RSS Feed [Permalink](/t5/Security-and-Fraud/PayPal-Withholding-My-Funds-Beyond-the-180-Day-Period/m-p/3194208/highlight/true#M161660)[Print](/t5/forums/forumtopicprintpage/board-id/SecurityandFraud/message-id/161660/print-single-message/true/page/1) [Report Inappropriate Content](/t5/notifications/notifymoderatorpage/message-uid/3194208)
Posted on
Nov-22-2024
02:27 AM
Hello Community, I need urgent help regarding my PayPal account. On May 9, 2024, PayPal permanently limited my account and informed me that I would be able to withdraw my funds after the 180-day period. As of November 5, 2024, this period has ended, and I was expecting to withdraw my money, as per PayPal's own policy. However, despite multiple attempts to contact their support team, I have only received repeated responses about "reviews" and "security checks," without any clear explanation or timeline for releasing my funds. This delay is unacceptable as: The 180-day hold is explicitly stated in their user agreement, and I have abided by this. I was informed that any deductions or liabilities would be resolved within the 180 days, which should now be completed. I rely on this money, and withholding it without any valid reason is not just unfair but also a breach of trust. I am sharing my story here in the hope that someone in the community can guide me or help escalate this issue to PayPal. PayPal, this is my hard-earned money, and I deserve to access it now. Please address this matter urgently. Thank you.

Haven't Found your Answer?
It happens. Hit the "Login to Ask the community" button to create a question for the PayPal community.
